content.user_title: Create structured content with Defou workflow
content.value_statement: Transform raw ideas into compelling, high-value content with a proven framework. Generate five content variations, score viral potential, and schedule for optimal engagement.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes raw ideas and selects optimal content angles using anti-consensus framework
Generates five content templates from a single angle: experience, counter-intuitive, list, case study, and growth story
Creates four hook styles per content: counter-intuitive, pain-point, results, and suspense
Scores viral potential across curiosity, resonance, clarity, and shareability dimensions
Recommends optimal posting times based on content type
Outputs structured Markdown reports with full analysis and scoring
limitations: Requires user to provide initial raw ideas or source content
Output is limited to Chinese (Simplified) content only
Does not create visual assets or multimedia content

use_cases.title: Social media content
use_cases.description: Transform quick ideas into polished posts with viral potential scoring.

use_cases.title: Long-form articles
use_cases.description: Structure insights into compelling narratives that build audience trust.

use_cases.title: Multi-format campaigns
use_cases.description: Generate five content angles from one core message for A/B testing.

best_practices: Provide raw ideas with clear context for better angle selection
Review all five template variations before choosing your final content
Use the viral potential scores to iterate on hooks before publishing
anti_patterns: Do not ask for content in languages other than Chinese (Simplified)
Avoid providing overly vague ideas without any supporting context
Do not expect visual content generation from this skill

faq.question: What languages does this skill support?
faq.answer: Output is in Simplified Chinese only. Input ideas can be any language.

faq.question: Can I use this for English content?
faq.answer: No, this skill is designed for Chinese content creation only.

faq.question: How does viral scoring work?
faq.answer: Scores across four dimensions: curiosity, resonance, clarity, and shareability. Max 100 points.

faq.question: Does this post to social media?
faq.answer: No, this skill generates content reports. It does not have posting capabilities.

faq.question: What file formats can I input?
faq.answer: Paste text directly. For files, use Claude Code file reading tools before prompting.

faq.question: How long should my input be?
faq.answer: Works with any length. More context yields better angle selection and content quality.
